title: Eric Serra "Big Score" album cover type
author: rich

comments.content:
This seems to be a mix of ideas from Art Deco/Moderne styles. The B is like Braggadocio, several letters are like Bust in the Solotype books. It resmbles Glaser's Baby Teeth in some ways. I couldn't find one typeface to match it all, so it's tempting to guess it was 'inspired' by several older styles from that era.

- Mike Yanega
